alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hampshire, central Franklin and north central Hampden Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hadley, or near Northampton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rain in excess of 1 inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Greenfield, Deerfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Montague, Granby, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Williamsburg, Buckland, Conway, Shelburne, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury and Ashfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
